How to install:

2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Set in Chicago, where a central network of computers connects everyone and everything, Watch_Dogs explores the impact of technology within our society. Using the city as your weapon, you will embark on a personal mission to inflict your own brand of justice.

Chicago's overarching network is known as the Central Operating System (ctOS), and it controls almost all of the city's technology and information - including key data on all of the city's residents.

You play as Aiden Pearce, a brilliant hacker and former thug, whose criminal past led to a violent family tragedy. While seeking justice for those events, you'll monitor and hack those around you by manipulating the ctOS from the palm of your hand. You'll access omnipresent security cameras, download personal information to locate a target, control traffic lights and public transportation to stop the enemy... and more.

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

Q: Does this require Steam?
A: No.

Q: Does this require Ubisoft Uplay?
A: No.

Q: Does this require a CD to play?
A: No.

Q: What version is this?
A: 1.06.329 (Update 6)

Q: Which crack is used?
A: 3DM (Launcher version). RELOADED, Steam006 et. al. versions are out-of-date.

Q: Are the Uplay rewards included?
A: Yes!

Q: File D3DCompiler_43.dll or xinput1_3.dll is missing.
A: Install DirectX inside the Redists folder.

Q: File msvcr100.dll missing.
A: Install Visual C++ 2010 inside the Redists folder.

Q: When I launch, my screen is all messed up.
A: Update your Video Card Driver.

Q: I get a message saying "Watch dogs requires that your graphics hardware be compatible with Directx11"
A: Your video card does not support DirectX11 and therefore it cannot play the game. You can Force Warp with dxcpl to get it to work in some circumstances.

Q: There's no sound!
A: Update your Sound Card driver. Install DirectX inside the Redists folder. Change sound Playback option to "Stereo" in Control Panel.

Q: Game has stopped working after Ubisoft logo!
A: Disable SLI or Crossfire.

Q: I have other questions about game settings and setup not covered in the instructions.
A: I've created a nice little tutorial for you here:

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

Q: Will this installer work on a Mac?
A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

Q: Does this contain viruses?
A: No. However, false positive 28/57 on virustotal: https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/ae8cd8f829bdc4658107c76f0456f00a29f0d457e8da4efaea0518d395dba216/analysis/

Q: My antivirus deleted the crack!
A: In the bin directory I have placed a backup folder with both versions of the 3DM crack in it. Follow the instructions in the text file.

Q: Will you marry me?
A: No.
